      it's me. i am beaver

      still can't find all of it

      the train of thought is exactly depicted in the video. it is a 'thought-train' video

12.7.20  12:40 pm   In your ball & stick video, how did the ball get imprisoned in a cardbored prison

      forced perspective

12.7.20  11:49 am   how come your awake during night

      if i am awake during the night, that often could mean i was asleep during the day

12.7.20  10:22 am   im failing my college courses, any advice? 

      how about buying the college

12.7.20  9:34 am   how were you able to master the art of amazing animation?

      i'm wondering how i ever will

12.7.20  8:02 am   what is best animal?

      computers

12.7.20  7:35 am   don't you think that genres are useful to understand each other? Sure, many songs are challenging to classify as only one, and all of them are inspired by more than one genre, but still it's a simplification that makes sense and often is useful

      sure. like language, it's more of an art than a science. enjoy, and expect it to break its own rules

12.7.20  6:26 am   what should I do if I have no thoughts?

      fEeL

12.7.20  5:52 am   i might be over analyzing this, but is the hidden meaning of Mount St Helens all about Change? I've been thinking about that for a while now.

      change is everywhere in our world. that's not exactly hidden

12.7.20  4:30 am   what was the bad thing you did

      i have never done a bad thing. i have only done good things, and a few things that are mildly questionable

12.7.20  3:40 am   Is "normal" just a social construct?

      yes

12.7.20  3:16 am   what are some interesting instruments you think should be used in more music?

      jeans

12.7.20  3:07 am   what genre of music is your music?

      normal

12.7.20  2:54 am   12.5.20  11:15 am you say it may help to imagine a "scene", but i'm not sure what you mean by that. what is a scene? what types of details does it contain? is there a different word you could use that would convey the same meaning?

     this is a songwriting trick i have discovered recently, which is to pretend it's in a video. pretend it's taking place in a movie, inside a story. This doesn't even mean you're gonna write a video, but sometimes just pretending it's taking place in a video, will immediately cause interesting songwriting to materialize effortlessly. it's bizarre, because many times when this technique is working, it's not even associated with any particular video content. it's just because you told yourself to pretend you are thinking of visual content, this somehow creates an automatic trigger for songwriting

12.7.20  1:27 am   got any jokes

      what the heck is a joke

12.7.20  1:23 am   I miss your music. Do you have an estimated time for when you're going to make more?

      AS OFTEN AS POSSIBLE, CONSTANTLY, AND ALWAYS

12.7.20  1:02 am   is christmas real

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake

12.7.20  12:56 am   is this pea world

      sort of

12.7.20  12:52 am   what's your opinion on wet bread?

      mush

12.7.20  12:22 am   whats ur favorite jazz album? 

      what the heck is a jazz album

12.6.20  11:25 pm   what did your learning curve for your video editing look like

      you can see it very clearly if you watch all of my videos

12.6.20  10:43 pm   how do you come up with the chord progression on some of your songs

      i just come up with the melody/lyric, and usually most of the chords will be baked right in

12.6.20  9:30 pm   What are your thoughts on the lyrics of "just did a bad thing" being so relatable now?

      that should make it more likely that i will win the nobel peace price, which i assume i have been nominated for

12.6.20  9:17 pm   Are flip flops made for feet or hands

      they are made for the ass

12.6.20  8:35 pm   How meaningful to you is the video component of your work, relative to the music?

     that depends if the video is for a song

      Ever considered dialing back the video complexity to allow for more music creation?

     yes

     Thanks, big fan here

12.6.20  7:41 pm   What do you think is the point of art?

      to save lives

12.6.20  6:36 pm   where do you get your ideas

      from the toilet, in the gutter. bet you didn't think they had toilets in the gutter, well here i am, as living proof

12.6.20  5:44 pm   are you secretly a bird?

      i either don't know or can't tell you

12.6.20  5:20 pm   Why did you post your first video?

      this was part of a broader scheme to post many many many videos

12.6.20  4:43 pm   are you going to put anything on instagram before the release of the next video?

      yes

12.6.20  4:35 pm   How do you stay motivated when it is hard

      have you considered crying like a baby

12.6.20  3:26 pm   thoughts on the holidays?

      sometimes it's nice to switch it up, and have a lousy day on the holidays, and have much much better days for every other day in your life

12.6.20  3:24 pm   In the " La de da de da de da de day oh" video in the "things I want to say" list you wrote "I love satan", why? What does it mean?

      could be just a way to spice things up

12.6.20  3:11 pm   What do you classify as a "average question?"

      'what do you think of the word moist'

12.6.20  2:42 pm   how dare you be so normal

      i will try to tone it down

12.6.20  2:16 pm   youre an amazing content creator. I honestly draw so much comfort from your content, so thank you

      holy smokes you are very friendly

12.6.20  1:30 pm   do the glasses you occasionally wear in your videos help you see?

      no

12.6.20  1:27 pm   were you walking around the airport terminal when you suddenly came up with the idea for "at the airport terminal?"

      no, but i was at the studio doing a new song idea generating session and i was fondly remembering a recent time i had been through an airport terminal

12.6.20  12:43 pm   Hey! I was just wondering, in what key signature is your tune "When I Get Older"?

     key of Bb. the bridge sections seem to borrow from Bb minor

      I rrally want to learn on the guitar and maybe it's just me, but the rythm feels very complex somehow.

     the key signature has nothing to do with the rhythm. but the time signature is 3/4

      Anyhow, I hope you are well and take care!

12.6.20  12:37 pm   How do you exactly make and come up with the lyrics and melodies of your songs

      a new trick i sometimes use is to 'set the scene'. think of a scene. usually at that point the songs just start spewing out. i would give you an example right now, but then the songs will start spewing and i already have way too many songs written. need to record them

12.6.20  12:31 pm   hey bill wurtz i was thinking of learning to play the guitar to be able to make songs and stuff but i do not know anything about music theory and as i learn to play songs that other people have made will i be able to be good at making songs myself or is playing and creating a different thing entirely please hlep

      first just try it and see what happens, then get back to me

?

      might be fake

12.6.20  10:00 pm   what is life

      an opportunity for growth

      it's pretty good

      not quite

12.6.20  7:38 am   do your songs have any secret meaning

      that depends on whether you've found it

      yes but i can never figure out how many of them there are because i keep falling asleep when i try to count them
